Job Description:
•	Work closely with Digital Media and Brand team to make sure all the digital contents are aligned with brand strategy and direction
•	Be able to work with in house designer on developing artwork related with contents planning.
•	Coordinate with media and digital suppliers to published PR from our internal team.
•	Daily check on our advertisements in supplier's website or digital channel to make sure all our ads are executed based on the plan.
•	Do monthly digital report and submit to management
•	Monitor on competitors’ activities and send the report to brand team & management
•	Brand page management (Facebook, Instagram, Youtube).

•	Bachelor’s degree in Marketing and Communications, Business Studies, Management, or a related field
Professional Experience	
•	At least 1 year of experience in Digital, Media, PR, Communications and/or related area.
•	Understand social trends, computer, creative ideas
•	Strong interpersonal skills and a capacity for problem-solving and diplomacy.
•	Verbal and written communication skills including experience in writing caption and articles.
•	Project management experiences
•	Highly organized
•	Fluent in Khmer & English – writing, reading, speaking, and listening
•	Multi-task
•	Good time management
Company Profile: Since its founding in 1982, Chip Mong has focused extensively on the changing needs of the society and the strengthening of its relationships with business communities, both domestically and internationally. In recent years, Chip Mong has experienced tremendous growth and evolved into one of the largest groups of companies in the country, comprising seven wholly-owned subsidies, three joint-ventures, and two hotel projects. Chip Mong’s businesses include construction and materials, consumers goods, property development, beverages, general industrials, hospitality, retail and feed. The Company also offers a vast array of consumer products from well-known manufacturers throughout the region.

Translate business requirements to technical documents in accordance with agreed templates.

Company Profile:
Amret (https://www.amret.com.kh) is a leading microfinance institution established in 1991 that contributes to the economic and social development of Cambodia by providing a wide range of financial services to meet the needs of the large targeted customers. Amret has strong commitment and long-term business strategies to be a leading financial institution in the market by deploying ambitious digital strategies. 

Amret belongs to the Advans international group (www.advansgroup.com) a major shareholder and international shareholder (FMO and IFC). The Advans group serves over 750,000 clients, and has expanded its operations in nine countries such as Cambodia, Cameroon, Ivory Coast, Democratic Republic of Congo, Ghana, Myanmar, Nigeria, Pakistan, and Tunisia. 

Amret has more than 150 branches, located in 25 cities and provinces in Cambodia, and successfully serves 450,000 customers with around 4,000 highly dedicated employees.
Contact Info: Contact Information Recruitment and Job Management  092333020 jobs@amret.com.kh #80, Street 315, Sangkat Boeung Kak2, Khan Toul Kok, Phnom Penh, Cambodia. 092333020

Job Description:
1) Manage the ID works of the projects ensuring handover dates are met and works are done as per design, specifications & with utmost quality.
2) Review and approve drawings submitted by subcontractors and check for any conflicts with other trades like MEP.
3) Evaluate & Accept materials submittals to ensure subcontractors are following standards on every project.
4) Conduct site inspections on all projects and assess if subcontractors are performing high quality installation works.
5) Needs to be involved in the tendering & vetting process. Check BOQ submitted and quotations of contractors & suppliers.
6)Should work also with the MEP Design & Costing Team at stages of the projects to ensure proper coordination on every trade. 
7)Prepare and submit reports pertaining to technical issues, project timelines and status, financial matters and other items necessary. 
8)Attend meetings with clients and other stakeholders. Also need to organize meetings with contractors on a regular basis. 
9)Monitor procurement and delivery of materials and ensure that they will be available when needed at site for installations. 
10)Set up appropriate and efficient filing system for all drawings and documents relating to all projects. 
11)Prepare project timelines and program of works for each project in coordination with MEP schedules and associated works. 
12)When needed, should be able to assist in the preparation of drawings via AutoCAD software or other similar applications.
Job Requirement:
* Job Requirement
- Bachelor Degree in Mechanical/Electrical/Plumbing Engineering. 
- Preferably have good knowledge of Air Distribution system, Hydraulic network, ACMV Equipment selection in chilled water & direct expansion systems, Smoke exhaust system, water filtration system & hot water production.
- At least five years of relevant experience in engineering sector.
- Ability to lead a team, to take decision and evaluate priority.
- Have negotiation skill.
- Good interpersonal skill.
- Ability to communicate effectively verbally and in writing in English and/or French.
- Computer literacy and especially MS Offices, MS Project, AutoCAD.
- Coordination with Clients & Consultants.

- Participate in implementation of all necessary financial policies and procedures to ensure the effective delivery of financial management service and compliance with relevant regulations.

- Monitors the records of daily accounting operations to ensure timely, reliable and accurate records for the company.
- Advise management on financial and accounting issue for decision making and immediate improvement. 
- Control company assets.
- Make adjustment (Inventory, fixed assets, depreciation, tax adjustment, payroll, and accrual account)

- Review all invoice printing 
- Assist FM to set up proper internal control.
Engage with external auditor.
- Communicate and problem solving with other departments. 
- Ensure the timely and successful delivery of financial reporting as schedule.

- Degree in Accounting-Finance, Business and Management, or a related area
- 2 or 3 years of experience in related work. 
- Experience with Quick Books Premier is preference. 
- Knowledge of Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint…) with massive data. 
- Highly responsible for work completion with accuracy and within deadline
- Good interpersonal Communication and problem solving skill
- Confident and self-motivated
- Able to write, read and speak in English.
- Work independence and self-management. 
- Excellent teamwork and team building skills
- Strong desire to learn and commit to his/her further development.
- Ability to work under pressure and be flexible

Job Description:

Company Profile: Since its founding in 1982, Chip Mong has focused extensively on the changing needs of the society and the strengthening of its relationships with business communities, both domestically and internationally. In recent years, Chip Mong has experienced tremendous growth and evolved into one of the largest groups of companies in the country, comprising seven wholly-owned subsidies, three joint-ventures, and two hotel projects. Chip Mong’s businesses include construction and materials, consumers goods, property development, beverages, general industrials, hospitality, retail and feed. The Company also offers a vast array of consumer products from well-known manufacturers throughout the region.

Company Profile: For more than the last three years, Luxcity Hotel & Apartment has been recognized as one of the very best places to stay.Luxcity Hotel & Apartment is a 4-star building located by Phnom Penh Megamall (under construction) as well as cafés, bars and restaurants. Secured, quiet suitable for high-ranking officials. The building is from Phnom Penh city centre 2 km. The building is also near Eden Garden, Khalendale, TK Avenue, Independence Monument 2.7 km, Bophana Audiovisual Resource Center 1.7 km & Central Mall Phnom Penh 1.4 km, Royal Palace/National Museum. It's also convenient to travel to Phnom Penh airportLuxcity Hotel & Apartment offers a wide range of services by friendly and professional associates who embody Cambodian traditional hospitality combined with international standards.Luxcity Hotel & Apartment is a 25 storey building based on the podium, comprises 166 rooms. The building also provides 24-hour reception, 24-hour security and housekeeping service, complimentary laundromat, high-speed Internet & one parking lot at automated car park, swiming pool, restaurant. You can keep fit with fitness and gym classes.All of classic rooms are provided you with all emenities. Each unit also features an electric kettle, coffee/tea making facilities and kitchenware. Begin a day with continental breakfast. The local dishes are served in the gastronomic restaurant. You will find Mike's Burger House, Ho Kee Bak Kut Teh and Vinissimo offering the meals nearby. Luxcity Hotel & Apartment is only a short distance from PP train station.

Job Description:
• Set Strategic goal and lead the Academic Department to achieve the set goal in accordance with school vision, mission and SLOs
• Report monthly achievement to the School Director and BOD and propose action plan for next month and assist the School Director and BOD in setting school goals and directions of the campus.
• Represent school in the community/media and participate in the school marketing activities, fundraising events, celebrations or other activities to promote school reputation and public awareness.
• Work with department managers to make sure ALL is in compliance with the law and regulations of Cambodia and with the requirements from relevant authorities - Ministry of Education, Youth and Sport (MoEYS), Ministry of Labor, Immigration Office, etc.
• Guide and collaborate with International Principals and Coordinators to evaluate the success of the international curriculum and the effectiveness of the teaching based on data of student learning outcomes from internal assessments and external assessment
• Lead and support Khmer teachers in their work duties including reviewing lesson plans, improving teaching standards/approach and providing training and professional development plan in the Khmer Program,
• Lead and support the Academic Team in their work duties including collecting/reviewing data on student grades, progress, learning approach, behavior, attendance and proposing action plan for improvement with relevant faculty members/managers
• Conduct performance review of staff in the Academic Department and Khmer Faculty and provide reflective feedback and support staff to achieve the set professional growth
• Create positive school climate and culture of thriving for excellence within the whole school
• Review and propose school procedures and policies for teaching staff and academic team members to improve the internal operations and the achievement of guiding statements
• Meet and solve all issues raised by teaching staff, academic principals and program coordinators in accordance with school policies and guiding statements
• Develop professional development plans or training for the Academic Team and Khmer Teachers
• Organize promotional events for school to the public, in the media or session for parent or public,
• Organize sessions to cultivate student culture of growth mindset, desire to learn and independent learners in accordance with the character profile adopted school wide,
• Organize academic competitions and lead students in various educational events/competitions outside of school
• Liaise with third parties to create partnership, improve school programs, and exchange good practices and friendship.
• Meet with parents to discuss about student academic as well as other concerns
• Keep good record of students and academic department in accordance with the school policies and requirements from MoEYS
• Collaborate with MoEYS for licensing and other compliance
• Attend and conduct educational trainings and conferences as needed,
• Attend and conduct academic meetings with relevant staff members and teachers,
• Perform other managerial tasks in accordance with the campus management.
Job Requirement:
- Master's degree in English of Art or Advance
- At least 5 years experience
- Update English programs
- Teachers Training
- Projects Management
- Be friendly, flexible, honestly, hard-working, integrity and willing to work as a team.

Job Description: • Review contractors’ proposed construction programmed and verify the timely completion of key elements and phases• Monitor and provide regular reports to the contractors’ installation and quality control procedures and undertake quality assurance audits• Facilitate discussion between planning and design department to resolve design and construction inrelation to technical issues• Prepare progress reports during the progress of the works on a monthly basis, or at other intervalsconsidered necessary by the project manager• Make regular site inspections to ensure that the works are being properly coordinated, supervised and executed in accordance with the contract documents and to good and safe engineering practices• Revie progress of the contract works and at regular intervals of the project, carry out inspection andprovide a full list and report of snags and defects• On completion of the contract works, provide a written report and summary of lessons learnt• Responsible for coordination of MEP works to avoid discrepancies and non-compliance on-site• Coordinate and attend joint inspections of defect rectification with the contractor and the contractors• Monitor and approve that all defects, snags and outstanding works are rectified• Verify all MEP equipment settings provided by the contractor• Other tasks will assign by direct manager.
Job Requirement: • Bachelor degree in Electrical/Mechanical Engineering and other relevant fields• Proven Minimum 2-3 years’ experience in contract (preferred) or developer firm• Knowledge in AutoCAD, Sketch Up, MS Office & Photoshop and Lift Traffic Analysis• Good knowledge of machinery and hydraulic, electrical, plumbing and others MEP program• Has experienced in Condo or High building project• Good command of English and Chinese (Optional)• Strong commitment to all health and safety guidelines• Confident strong communication presentation skills
Company Profile: Urban Hub Cambodia is a multi-award-winner and one of Cambodia’s biggest fully licensed real estate developers. We are committed to developing projects that provide the new generations of Cambodia with exceptional modern living and experience of the first world that focuses on “LIVE, WORK, PLAY” yet preserving the Cambodian tradition and identity of community living.Registered in 2017, Urban Hub Cambodia is a joint venture between a Hong Kong-based conglomerate, Goldfame Group, the largest Hong Kong investor in Cambodia since 1992, and a Cambodian-American real estate company, Urban Living Solutions. Urban Hub Cambodia has quickly become a leading mixed-use property developer and the first developer ever from Cambodia to win the most awards including two major regional awards, “Best Condo Development in Asia 2019” and “Best Co-working Space in Asia 2020” at Asia’s longest-running and most respected property awards organized by PropertyGuru. Urban Hub Cambodia is behind the four most award-winning Cambodian projects both locally and regionally, including Urban Loft, Factory Phnom Penh, Urban Village Phase 1, and Urban Village Phase 2. More projects are expected in the near future.
Contact Info: Contact Information Human Resources Department  010222019 / 017999255 jobs@villagephnompenh.com Phnom Penh #1159, National Road 2, Phum Preaek Ta Nu, Sangkat Chak Angrae Leu, Khan Mean Chey, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 010222019 / 017999255

Job Description:

• Generate new business leads.

• Coordinate marketing strategies with the sales, financial, public relations, and production departments.

• Extensive knowledge of marketing strategies, channels and branding .

Company Profile: Urban Hub Cambodia is a multi-award-winner and one of Cambodia’s biggest fully licensed real estate developers. Company Profile:
Starting from 1951 in Texas, United States, Circle K is now one of  the most widely recognized convenience store brands, known worldwide for  quality products & great customer service with more than 15.000  associates worldwide including Hong Kong, China, Vietnam, Indonesia,  UAE, Macau, Mexico, Honduras, Guam, Malaysia, The Philippines, Egypt  & Costa Rica…

At Circle K Cambodia, our mission is to be the best and most convenient place for all of your daily shopping needs.

Vision
To be the leading No 1 Neighborhood Convenience Store in Cambodia providing 24 hours conveniences, exclusive merchandise and value added services to our customers.

Mission
To Make Our Customer Life’s a Little Easier Everyday

Core Value
1- Customer Focus: Customer are the reason for our success in Business and we are committed to listen and respond positively to their need.
2- Integrity: Honest, Trustworthy, Adhere to Strong Moral and Ethical Principle and Value.
3- Teamwork: one team, one goal and one direction – with collaboration, share and support each other.
4- Accountability: taking ownership for a task or role and committed to execute and deliver result.
5- Courtesy & Respect: treating other people the way you want to be treated.
6- Continuous Growth: Proactive to Adapt to Instance change.
7- Excellent: Aim for higher quality and accuracy, usually above performance standard.

Currently Circle K Cambodia is having more than 35 Store locate in the following:
- Phnnom Penh
- Siem Reap

company_name: One Fraternity Co., Ltd. (Vital Premium Water, Mee Chiet)
Job Description:
1.	Do daily route visit in assigned areas to generate orders following stock rules to ensure weekly safety stocks in each outlet, and to manage products shelf life
2.	Drive distributions to ensure sales target achievement is satisfactorily met
3.	Ensure product visibility in outlets at prime location and stock movement of customers is under controlled (FIFO Method) 
4.	Maintain strong and long-term business relationships with customers, ensuring overall servicing of customers is met
5.	Monitor and provide feedback on competitor’s advertising & promotional activities on time
6.	Assist Manager, Area Sales to identify new opportunities for business with both existing and new customers
7.	Assist Manager, Area Sales to drive distributions and other sales channels in assigned areas and develop coverage expansions
8.	Other tasks assigned by line manager
Job Requirement:
1.	Education: 
o	Bachelor Degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or relevant fields
2.	Experiences: 
o	Possess 1-year experience in sales, preferably with FMCG or Trading 
3.	Skills and knowledge: 
o	Demonstrate good communication 
o	Demonstrate good command of English and Khmer 
o	Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, Power Point)
o	Ability to learn and use new technology
Company Profile: One Fraternity is a Cambodian-owned company specializing in sales, distribution, and marketing of a wide range of consumer products. Since the establishment in 2010, we have extensive experiences and affiliations with diverse stakeholders, including government institutions, businesses, wholesalers, retailers, agents, and customers across Cambodia. With broad distribution channels and industry expertise, from market research and analysis, assessing customer needs, sales, marketing, or distribution, we help build the strategy that works for our business partners who want to grow their businesses in new and existing markets in Cambodia.

Job Description:
Job Summary:
Recruitment and Training Supervisor responsible for finding and recruiting candidates to fulfill job
vacancies and planning for employee training and development program.

 Responsibility
 Assist in designing job description and keep up-to-date,
 Handle and manage internal and external job announcement to efficient channels
 Prepare shortlisted candidates and contact for interview,
 Conduct and coordinate for interviewing session,
 Prepare appointment letter and handle for hiring process,
 Inform successful candidates on-board to related departments,
 Maintain a database of potential candidates for future job openings,
 Study industry remuneration for competitive labor market,
 Coordinate for future head count needed,
 Prepare and execute employee orientation program,
 Conduct employee exit interview session,
 Assist in conduct training needs analysis,
 Prepare the training calendar on a monthly basis,
 Coordinate and conduct some training programs,
 Assist in design and implement training programs to meet company goal,
 Assist in evaluate training effectiveness,
 Monitor for departmental training,
 Maintain an up-to-date training record,
 Prepare the month end reports on training activities,
 Manage the administer of apprenticeship program,
 Other tasks to be assigned by superior.

 Other Duties:
 To report for duty punctually wearing the correct uniform and ID card
 To maintain a high standard of personal appearance and hygiene
 To provide friendly, courteous and professional service at all times
 To maintain good working relationships with colleagues and all other departments
 To attend training sessions and meetings as and when required.
Job Requirement:
 SKILLS AND EXPERIENCES:
 3-4 years experiences in recruitment and training field
 Bachelor degree in related field
 Good in Microsoft office
 Good interpersonal and communication skill
 Good in presentation skill
 Good in English both speaking and written.

 Working Days and Hours:
 Monday to Half Sunday
 Working hour: From 8:00 am to 5:30 pm (Break 1 hour)

Job Description:
• Lead and create comprehensive sales activities to increase sales volume.
• Monitor the daily work of sales executives.
• Keep track of the sales activities of the sales team and constantly follow up the results.
• Generate business and promote company’s products to the market.
• Contact and visit new/existing potential customers and propose the products and/or projects.
• Create sales training for sales team to enhance sales skills of the team.
• Set up weekly, monthly meeting with sales team to track and improve the sales performance.
• Follow up business opportunities and maintain good business relation with new and existing customers.
• Set up sales visit plans and market survey around the country.
• Handle customers complains and act as example by following company policies
• Work with the team to implement sales strategies in order to achieve the sales target.
• Review Quotations, Bidding document, Acceptance document and other related document.
• Keep updating the product and business information.
• Submit monthly sales report to the management team.
• Responsible for other tasks as assigned by management team.
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor’s Degree or higher in Engineer, Sales & Marketing, Business Administration and a related field
• Have Electric Wire knowledge is priority
• At least 2-3 years working experience in sales and able to manage team members
• Obtain leadership skill and able to motivate team member to perform
• Fast and efficient worker, able to work under pressure and highly responsible
• Outstanding organizational and time management skills
• Proactive problem solver with result oriented mind set
• Willing to work hard and flexibility in working hours
• Ability to multitask and prioritize daily workload
• Able to travel to country side short notice and conduct business surveys around the country
• Good attitude and good interpersonal skill
• Good command of spoken and written English. If Chinese is priority

Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

Job Description: - To manage and coordinate the activities of all the staff members engaged in inventory   control and inventory record accuracy- Ensure stock availability by maintaining optimal levels of stock at all times, foresee   supply and demand, taking a strategic approach to replenishing so that both overstocking   and running out of stock are avoided- Provides inventory analysis to support store operations throughout the physical and post   inventory- Handle purchases and transfer by carry out the entire phase of product purchasing, from   selecting to tracking shipment and receiving orders, to ensure that purchases arrive on   time and in good condition and also take charge of internal stock transfers, moving   products to other store branches- Develops and implements procedures to ensure all inventory is accounted for and reported   accordingly to company policy- Ensures that inventory counts are completed regularly and in a timely manner- Review daily inventory reports for possible errors and reports information to upper   management and finance Department- Maintain an accurate inventory of both stock items and transactions, noting down dates   of purchase and receipt, item count and detail, issues encountered, and more,   consolidate this into regular reports presented to other department units such as   finance- Evaluate suppliers and inform all the details to Procurement Department and Head of   Department related to schedule of delivery and quality of the products etc…- Report to upper management on stock levels, issues etc.…- Checked the quality and Counted all the items when received stock from supplier- Stamped and singed on the Invoice and make a copy keep them in folder for record- Entry all received items into POS System and make sure all the details has been entering   correctly (quantity and cost)- Prepared all the items to the requester (from all campuses) and checked, counted to make   sure all items and quantity are correct- Send the list of items to the requestor and informed them about the quantities.  If the   quantities not enough or do not have in stock will informed the requestor to revised   their request quantities based on actual quantity - Transfer all the items to requestor on POS System and informed the requestor to   confirmed if everything corrects, signed on the Good Received Note and return it back to   Warehouse- Perform monthly stock counting - Prepare monthly stock counting report- Checked and verified all the stock variances - Arrange and store all the items in warehouse in proper location and label them for easy   to access and ensure the warehouse always clean and tidy- Prepare daily, monthly and yearly task list and send to IB’s management- Effectively utilize all resources to maximum potential performance to achieve company   goals- Perform other related duties as requested
Job Requirement: - Must have at least 3 years inventory control management and supervisory experience- Strong Microsoft Office skills includes: Excel, Word, PowerPoint and Database concepts- Shows the ability to work well under pressure and very tight schedule- Solid knowledge in inventory management related areas and should be familiar with the   inventory management system.- Excellent leadership skills, communication and interpersonal skills along with the   ability to develop and maintain effective relations with the staff members by extending - Project management skills, investigative nature, advanced math and technical skills   would beneficial- The ability to effectively manage the subordinates, supervise them, plan, organise and   control the work flow in a team environment- Good organization and business administration skills, attention to detail, willingness to improve, learn and adapt in accordance with the modern practice methods.How to apply!Submit your CVs to our Talent Acquisition Team (TAT),Via email to: hr@mjqeducation.edu.khTelegram: https://t.me/HRMJQETel: (855) 12 797 939, (855) 93 335 564
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services

Job Description:
As part of the Customer Services/OP team, you will look after Export/Import Airfreight. The role is day to day operations, include customer services, bookings arrangement with airline.

The duties are not limited to the below:
• Perform negotiations to secure capacity (schedules, rates) with airlines. Validate, proceed bookings with airlines in timely manner.
• Ensure all aspects of the bookings are properly recorded in file.
• Complete the daily processing of all export/import bookings with Clients/Oversea offices
• Work closely with terminal/nominated agent/transport provider/ other departments…
• Ensure the dispatch of airfreight in accordance with airline/terminal requirements.
• Solve related inquiries/issues from Customs/warehouse.
• Manage daily customer service activity within respective customer servicing, including standard operating procedure (SOP), shipment reports, system operation, customer requirements.
• Serve as the first point of escalation for customer queries/problems that CS staffs in the team are unable to close or resolve.
• Understand shipment process flows & systems, take corrective action to fix problems and improve continuously.
• Participate in trainings with HQ & overseas agents/departments
• Communicate operational and commercial needs of the branch and the branch’s clients to overseas colleagues, guaranteeing operational consistency and customer satisfaction
• Build and maintain good relationships with customers.
• Balance workloads within Customer Service team to ensure smooth operations during peak season or staff absence.
• Follow and monitor AR, AP, billing and month end files closing.
• Play an integral part to liaise with internal/external customers and service providers to ensure outstanding customer services.
• Others jobs per request on demands
Job Requirement:
** Key Skills & Attributes
• Excellent phone manner and written communication skills in English is a must
• Have an intermediate skill level in MS Excel & Word.
• 1 years + relevant experience in freight forwarding industry.
• Have good data entry skill, the ability to learn systems quickly
• Strong attention to detail
• Effective time management
• Excellent customer relations and relationship building skills.
• Flexibility to adapt to change and thrive in a fast-paced environment.
• Excellent interpersonal skills
• Personal integrity and honesty
• Strong analytical skill and problem-solving mindset
Company Profile: Established at the start of the new millennium, Apex Logistics is a growing Global Supply Chain Solutions Provider with a diverse cultural background. Founded in China with a global reach extending over six continents. We continue to outpace the market and grow in the most difficult of transportation cycles in global trade. The foundation of our success is an entrepreneurial approach empowering a highly skilled staff of supply chain and logistics professionals. The Apex management team is focused on providing our customers with a best in class service experience. We understand that creative solutions to traditional logistics needs are a primary factor in our success. We have learned that meeting customer demands and developing creative solutions is the basis of our “partnership” with our clients. Looking to the future, we now have expanded our service offerings to International Air, Ocean Transportation, Customs Brokerage, Local and Domestic Trucking, Warehouse Management, Global Supply Chain Management, 3PL, Risk Management, Trade Compliance and E-Commerce. Apex Logistics currently have 14 offices in Greater China Area: Beijing, Tianjin, Qingdao, Chongqing, Chengdu, Zhengzhou, Hangzhou, Shanghai, Nanjing, Ningbo, Shenzhen, Guangzhou, Hong Kong, Taiwan; 7 offices in the U.S. : Seattle, San Francisco, Los Angeles, Chicago, Dallas, New York, Miami; 1 in Mexico and 1 in Europe. Expansion to additional key markets in Asia, India Sub-Continent, Europe and Latin America remains a focus. We also have strategic partnerships across the globe through a tenured agency structure and our participation in the WCA in over 80 countries, that provides the same best in class services our customers have come to expect from Apex. Apex Logistics now have more than 1200 supply chain professionals working for our clients supply chains. The leadership team has a wealth of logistics experience, in-depth market knowledge and deep relationships with carriers and vendors. We have strong values and beliefs in training to our employees and continually expanding their skill sets, so we can better support our clients with the most “state of the art” solutions and options in how they move freight through the global supply chain. Our mission is to provide unrivaled quality in logistics service that drives accelerated growth and with the greatest value to our customers. We believe that understanding the specific practices and goals of our customers will instill a passion in the services we provide. This is the fundamental belief in our motto: “WE DELIVER PASSION.”

Job Description:
** Key Responsibilities:
• Ensure that production goals are meet our expectation of the actual plan
• Plans with team the production, anticipates problems, and suggests corrective actions.
• Implement in full of manufacturing and practice
• Maintain a normal production output and good cooperation with Quality control department
• Identify and implement creative and innovative ideas to get the sustainable business
• Adheres to security procedures and set the example for her/his team to follow and must be responsible for accurate completion.
• Act as a coach, mentor-motivator of his/her team. This means being actively involved in the performance management process by having the communication goals and values, giving
feedback continuously (both positive and constructive), listen, show empathy, organize corrective actions and training, assess performance in an objective way with
Communication for individual and team goals with values.
• Managing the training done by his team leaders with key effectiveness areas by setting, monitoring, and reviewing Performance and taking corrective action, as necessary.
• Be an active participant in the production with colleagues, and management team and act as a production team member by pointing out quality/ (production issues), attending meetings, making suggestions to improve output control with regards to the logistics planning of the factory to make sure that production is balanced
• Communicate to preparation/Laurelton cooperated partners by making sure discrepancy estimation are worked closely to HSE team to prevent accidents and injuries in the production floor and others with understand the lean manufacturing related to 6’s rule and SOP (Standard Operation Procedures).

Lead and coach
• Act as a coach, mentor-motivator of his/her team. This means being actively involved in the performance management process:
communicate goals and values, continuously give feedback (both positive and constructive), listen, show empathy, organize
corrective actions and training, assess performance in an objective way.
• Participate in the selection of supervisors and work cell supervisors for the plant
• Provide input as necessary for the performance management of supervisors in the production environment
• Coach and set plans to manage and improve performance.
• Communicate individual and team goals and values.
• Give clear assignment and follow up.

** Training
• Coordinate with Regional Production Manager in implementation of training, multiskilling and capability development program across all levels in production as per the relevant training plan (primarily covering Diamond technical training) formalized by the former
• Intensively work with his/her team: Supervisors/trainers, achieving training goals in all production areas: Preparation, Blocking, Bruting, Top, Bottom, Table and Star polishing as per training plan prepared by Regional Production Manager
• Refer to procedures and training programs at all the times and work closely with Regional Production Manager to ensure any revision and updates if required due to process changes or proposed process improvements
• Ensure proper allocation of trainees to work cells thereby maintaining balance within work cells
• Ensure production department follows trainings as per the plant training calendar

** Communication and Liaison
• Be an active participant in the production team.
• Be the communication liaison between the team, colleagues and management. As a production team member, you point out
quality / (production issues), attend meetings, make suggestions to improve
• Liaise actively with inventory control with regards to the logistics planning of the factory, making sure that production is balanced, and shipment schedules are adhered to
• Liaise actively with Quality assurance making sure quality standards are met.
• Liaise with the workshop making sure equipment issues are communicated.
• Communicate to Regional Production Manager/Quality Manager/Laurelton
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor’s Degree in engineering or other related fields
• 10+ years of production management operations in middle or senior management role handling team of supervisors and
workers
• Good understanding of flow of production processes and working with support teams like Quality, Finance, HR, IT , Admin etc.
• Excellent team work and communication skills.
• Good spoken English and basic English writing ability.
• Previous experience with performance management
• Good statistical/analytical skills
• Practical experience with MS Office

- Breakfast and Lunch is provided free

- Insurance (NSSF and FORTE 24/24)
- Annual basic increment
- Opportunity to grow

Job Description:
• Provide support to Production Manager in collecting and providing all the production data to determine overall and individual performances, estimating and following up the production capacity in lines with the plan, quality of all the related sections and theirs workers and reporting any variances and support Production Manager in developing plans to mitigate the issues.
• Support Production Manager in driving Continuous Improvement projects.
• To cooperate with other supervisors in the production department in managing, balancing, training the labor force to maintain the company's production schedule and quality.
• Continuously strive to raise standards of housekeeping in the production area. Support implementation of 6S methodology.
• Should be aware of problem-solving tools and should practice Corrective Action Preventive Action approach in problem solving.
• To track and determine the performance of the workers in the assigned sections and provide them continuous feedback with objective of efficiency improvement
• Facilitate the polishing skills training and ensure the training run properly as per guideline.
• To create scientific, plan, reporting charts and other necessary diagrams for keeping in record and reporting of productivity.
• Support Production Manager to set the procedure and instruction for the sections as required so that the workers can follow.
• To comply with all the company's regulation during the working time.
• To comply with the health and safety procedure and regulation during the working time.
• To obey all the machine operation manual, company's facilities maintenance, and protection regulation.
• To find out in advance any equipment and production issues to have soon action plan to prevent any serious problem.
• To cooperate with other supervisors in the ICPL & QC department to ensure all the shipment s is on schedule.
• To develop necessary reports and reporting systems in order to record and save all the production data for productivity / quality/ cost analysis. Use the same data to provide feedbacks to workers about their productivity and to manage various production steps with the aim to ensuring and reporting exactly the section's productivity, production cost as well as quality.
• To work closely with other support functions in particular HR, Engineering, Purchase departments towards developing effective feedback loop with objective of improving effectiveness.
• Support production manager to prepare the target chart for trainees and polishers following the company policy. Record
properly the actual stone produced by trainees and polishers, produce the monthly report and submit to production manager and relevant persons as require by the company
• Taking minute of meeting in production or as instruct by manager.
• Keep record of stock and make purchase plans for the necessary tools, equipment and consumable.
• Support Production Manager in tracking budget for the Production and reporting any abnormality and developing action plan for the same.
• Execute other tasks/project as assign by manager
Job Requirement:
• Strong background in manufacturing environments with experience of logistical and administrative planning and execution
• Excellent computer skills.
• A least three years supervisory experience with good leadership skills.
• Excellent spoken English and good English writing ability.
• Proven track record in the implementation and administration of stock control systems
• Experience in stock control philosophies and best practices

Job Description:
• Execute recruitment for internal and external opportunities by advertising, sourcing, screening, interviewing for all open

• Follow up all actions plan result from the workers committee meeting

committee members are legally registered to MoL

stone, ...

running properly and effectively

• Khmer Fluency 
• English fluency

• Strong interpersonal, communication, follow-up, problem solving and creative thinking skills 
• Strong consultative service skills 
• Must be organized, detail oriented, a self-starter, and able to handle multiple tasks simultaneously 
• Strong teamwork and team leadership skills 
• Proficient computer skills in MS Office and HRIS

Job Description:
* Introduction

A great opportunity has arisen with a leading coffee supplier company in Phnom Penh, Cambodia. We looking for a B2B, Manager, Marketing and Branding who can own their B2B marketing campaigns across the full marketing mix.
The successful candidate will need proven experience in Campaign Management, able to produce quality content, PR, and email marketing, and be commercially minded.

* Responsibilities

Collaborate with the Shareholders in executing the company’s B2B marketing strategy and programs (internal/external branding, lead generation, advertising/sponsorships, events, digital marketing) in order to support the company’s business objectives. Focused on acquiring and retaining new customers through the management of all online and offline marketing programs including, PPC, SEO/SEM, digital advertising, webinars, content syndication, email, social, lead nurturing, channel marketing, and analytics. Collaboration with an array of cross-functional team members and external vendors is essential to increasing marketing's contribution to revenue. This position requires a candidate with a blend of strategy, technical, creative, analytic, and project management expertise.

* Role Requirements

• Working on B2B marketing campaigns across the full marketing mix
• Delivering the content marketing strategy across multiple channels
• Manage the social media accounts creating relevant content, video, and blogs
• Create content to support events and webinars
• Web copywriter and content creation
• Driving marketing through CRM systems
• Market research and campaign planning
• Press releases and media planning with the external PR agency
• Email and postal DM marketing
• Track and report on campaign performance
• Work across the group's brands as required
Job Requirement:
Bachelor's degree in marketing, finance, business administration, or similar
• A master's degree in a relevant field will be advantageous
• At least three years of experience as a marketing manager or branding manager 
• Extensive knowledge of marketing strategies, channels, and branding
• Experience with online marketing, including social media, and content marketing
• Superb leadership, communication, and collaboration abilities
• Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills
• Strong time management and organizational abilities

* Competitive and Benefit 

1.	Base Salary 1000$-1500$
2.	Incentive of KPIs
3.	Annual salary adjustment 
4.	Incentive of award
5.	Incentive of promotion adjustment
6.	Allowance Phone 
7.	Health and accident insurance
8.	Work time 44h/1w (8am-5pm)
9.	Holiday and public holiday
10.	Training and Development skill
11.	Annual trip
12.	Annual party 
13.	Season party
14.	Annual leave 
15.	Sick leave 
16.	Maternity leave 
17.	Special leave

Company Profile:
GBS is a one-stop company for coffee and tea solutions, which is reflected in our logo. Founded in 2016, GBS mission was to foster Cambodian coffee industry through the 3 pillars – product, service and knowledge.
At GBS, we always look out to bring top quality products from around the world to combine with our best-in-class after-sales service. We are currently representing more than 20 brands in Cambodian market including, Nuova Simonelli, Victoria Arduino, Caffé Barbera, Lavazza, Hario, Iberital, Eureka, ODK, Blendtec, Hoshizaki, Melitta, Proaster, D&B, Monbana, Acaia, 3M Water Filtration, and others.
Acknowledging the complication of establishing or expanding a coffee business, thanks to a wide range of product offer, GBS focuses on providing a solution-based product package according to the customers’ individual request and business demand.
We offer complementary training as our barista demonstrates their skill and know-how to assist customer for the challenges in the coffee business environment. We also offer advanced barista and latte art classes for those who would like to further develop their skills.
We take pride in our technical service, as we receive many positive feedbacks since our day one in business. We invest significantly in spare parts to ensure our customer’s machine downtime is limited to the minimum. To compliment this, we ensure that our technicians are well-trained with technical knowledge and are always ready to respond to request for maintenance and repairs.
In 2018, GBS established B-Hub Barista Training Center to offer high quality barista training with tools and resources that allow student to dive deeper into a coffee world. In 2019, GBS began moving toward commercial and specialty coffee roasting, adding three more coffee blends into our product portfolio, as well as customizing special blends to meet the demand. In May 2020, we welcome our new showroom in Siem Reap, which is 40% bigger in space with a dedicated training room.
With all

Job Description:
* Assistant Manager Job Description

We are searching for a new assistant manager to join our team who is interested in helping to hire and train other team members. You will also assist in making sure the team adheres to company policies, resolving customer complaints, leading the team, and organizing the team schedule.
To be a great fit for this role you should have a consistent work history and previous experience as a senior staff member or as an assistant manager. A passion for customer service and team mentoring is also a plus.

*  Responsibilities:

•	Ensuring company policies are followed.
•	Optimizing profits by controlling costs.
•	Hiring, training and developing new employees.
•	Resolving customer issues to their overall satisfaction.
•	Maintaining an overall management style that follows company best practices.
•	Providing leadership and direction to all employees.
•	Ensuring product quality and availability.
•	Preparing and presenting employee reviews.
•	Working closely with the store manager to lead staff.
•	Overseeing retail inventory.
•	Assisting customers whenever necessary.
•	Organizing employee schedule.
•	Ensuring that health, safety, and security rules are followed.
•	Taking disciplinary action when necessary.
•	Ensuring a consistent standard of customer service.
•	Motivating employees and ensuring a focus on the mission.
•	Maintaining merchandise and a visual plan.
•	Maintaining stores to standards, including stocking and cleaning.
•	Completing tasks assigned by the general manager accurately and efficiently.
•	Supporting store manager as needed.
Job Requirement:
•	Bachelor’s degree in English, Management, Accounting, Finance, or related field.
•	At least 3 years’ experience in a similar role.
•	Stable work history.
•	Must be self-motivated and possess the desire for self-development.
•	Have the ability to work autonomously when required.
•	Be a team player.
•	Be dedicated to customer satisfaction and a great customer experience.
•	Experience as an assistant store manager or with retail store management.
Competitive and Benefit 
1.	Base Salary 400$-600$
2.	Incentive of KPIs
3.	Annual salary adjustment 
4.	Incentive of award

Job Description:
* Sales Executive Job Description 

We are looking for a passionate Sales Executive to join our sales team. The Sales Executive's responsibilities include generating leads, making sales calls, continuously updating our CRM database, and meeting sales targets.
To be successful as a Sales Executive you should be an inspired self-starter and able to drive sales growth. Ultimately, a top-notch Sales Executive should be able to build rapport with customers and close sales.

* Responsibilities:

•	Setting sale target monthly and weekly basis.
•	Answer to customers request with our products and purpose new products to customer.
•	Research and find the products to increase more proposal to customers.
•	Talk with customer regarding their problems in order to realize what they want (Become the consultant and business partner)
•	Think deeply for each problem to consider the better solutions.
•	Build strong relationship with existing and new customer.
•	Find new strategies to push sale.
•	More confident to work
•	More motivation to yourself, staff and customer 
•	Teaching staff to subordinates Work closely with department to deliver one quality process
•	Monthly visit current customer to ensure good condition
•	Other task assigns by sale manager
Job Requirement:
•	Bachelor degree in Business administration majoring in marketing or business-related field.
•	At least one-year experience in position sale or barista is prefer.
•	Be able to work under pressure for sale target.
•	Communication skills in speaking/Writing English.
•	Knowledge of computer literacy (Microsoft office word, Power point, Excel)
•	Good interpersonal communication skills and motivation skill.
•	Very patience, Flexible, Honest and Friendly.

Competitive and Benefit 

1.	Base Salary 300$-550$
2.	Income of Commission 250$-750$ per month
3.	Incentive of KPIs

Company Profile:
Westview Cambodian International School is the great extension to secondary education by the passionate leadership team of Learning Jungle International School Cambodia (LJIS) offering educational services only from preschool to elementary program. With the strong support from parents, students, staff, and the Ministry of Education, Youth and Sport, Westview Cambodian International School is created to offer the International Secondary program built from the world-renowned standards of education, American Common Core Standards (ACCS), and the Khmer language, history and culture into one unique curriculum from grades 7 to 12.

Our major achievements include becoming an IELTS test venue, becoming a member of CIS accreditation, conducting an international benchmark test for our students called MAP test, joining one of the big world conferences called Model United Nations, and receiving the HR Asia Award for the best company to work for in 2021.

Job Description:
• Maintaining, updating, repairing, improving base on existing services/applications and programs.
• Translate business needs (user stories) into technical requirements (functional applications).
• Design, perform code review, and reuse source code to develop new features in eMoney services/applications.
• Ensure the best possible performance, quality, and responsiveness of the applications
• Identify bottlenecks and bugs, and devise solutions to resolve these problems
• Writing technical documents such as URS (user requirement specification), SRS (software requirement specification), SAS (software architecture specification), and User guide...
• Do other duties as assigned by the leader, manager
• Study the technical updates and make the change or do upgrading release in Development area
Job Requirement:
•	Have bachelor / engineer in IT, computer science or equivalent
•	Have knowledge about software development models as well as tools supporting for software development.
•	Have a good background in OOP programming
•	Have 1+ year experience in Java language (Java web, Java application)
•	Have experience with web front-end as: HTML, CSS, Javascript, JQuery, Ajax
•	Have experience with framework as: Hibernate, Spring, Struct is a plus
•	Have experience with Oracle database is a plus
•	Have experience with API (RESTFull API, SOAP)
•	Have a good logical thinking in solving problem
•	Have knowledge about core Java, JSP, Servlet. Priority has experience with Java Web, EJB and Spring, Hibernate, Spring Boot frameworks, service API(REST, SOAP)
•	Have knowledge about database (Oracle, MySQL, SQL, PostgreSQL ...)
•	Understanding source code management tools (SVN, GIT...)
•	Be proactive at work, good at teamwork
•	Be fluent in English listening, speaking, reading and writing.
•	Priority points (be nice to have):
o	Study & graduate the university in Vietnam
o	Be good at speaking, listening, reading and writing in Vietnamese.
o	Have ability Teamwork, careful, attention to detail, logical thinking and always want to develop themselves
o	Understanding about Architecture & Design Patterns and having experience working on MVC model
o	Have knowledge, understanding or experience working on one of bank / finance / payment / e wallet field

** Benefit: 
•	Competitive Salary
•	13th Month Salary
•	Monthly Bonus
•	Staff’s Birthday
•	Seniority Payment
•	Bonus for Public Holiday
•	Insurance: NSSF and Forte
•       18 days for annual leave

Job Description: Human Resources and Administration Manager is accountable for the following:-Human Resources and Administration• Partner with Senior Management to implement programs and frameworks that support business objectives and driving results;• Develops manpower budgeting plan and strategy and implement it across different business and functions;• Provides supplies by identifying needs for reception, switchboard, meal-room, and kitchen; establishing policies, procedures, and work schedules;• Provides communication systems by identifying needs; evaluating options; maintaining equipment and approving invoices;• Leads, motivates, manages and develops the HR Support Services Function;• Manages other operational support functions like recruitment, payroll, on-boarding, termination activities, international mobility etc and ensuring risk control measures are in place under these functions;• Monitors full spectrum of monthly payroll computation and processing for all employees including foreign entities, ensures accurate and timely management of payroll, benefits and tax related services as well as employee medical insurance;• Supports business and functions by providing tools, process and policies in regard to talent management, compensation & rewards, employment regulations, recruitment and performance management; • Maintains administrative staff by recruiting, selecting, orienting, and training employees; maintaining a safe and secure work environment; developing personal growth opportunities;• Accomplishes staff results by communicating job expectations; planning, monitoring, and appraising job results; coaching, counseling, and disciplining employees; initiating, coordinating, and enforcing systems, policies, and procedures;• Purchases printed materials and forms by obtaining requirements; negotiating price, quality, and delivery; approving invoices;• Provides coordination, advice and support on full spectrum HR operational matters.• Provides historical reference by developing and utilizing filling and retrieval systems;• Improves program and service quality by devising new applications; updating procedures; evaluating systems results with users;• Achieves financial objectives by anticipating requirements; submitting information for budget preparation; scheduling expenditures; monitoring costs; analyzing variances;• Maintains continuity among corporate, division, and local work teams by documenting and communicating actions, irregularities, and continuing needs;• Maintains professional and technical knowledge by attending educational workshops; bench-marking professional standards; reviewing professional publication; establishing personal networks;• Contributes to team effort by accomplishing related results as needed; • And any other tasks as assigned by Sr. Management.
Job Requirement: • Independent and motivated;• A recognized Master’s Degree, specializing in Human Resource Management or related discipline.• Minimum 12 years of relevant working experience, out of which 3 years should be in generalist role, in a similar industry; • Minimum 5 years’ of relevant experience, ideally the last few years on a strategic role implementing HR policies and procedures and is hands on in payroll, training, recruitment, performance appraisal, hr branding and possess sound working knowledge of statutory legislation and other local statutory requirements;• Good track record in HR processes, policies and HR Management Systems;• At least 5 years in supervisory role.• Strong creative, strong strategic, analytical, strong organizational and time management skills;• Demonstration of creativity and ability to assess and take calculated risks;• Dynamic and has experience in dealing with crisis management;• Able to work in a highly matrix and multicultural environment;• Strong oral and written communications skills; • Has healthy life style, and able to work well under pressure.• Proficiency in English
Company Profile: Phnom Penh City Center (PPCC) is a 111.6-hectare development strategically located in the center of the city. This development was conceptualized to transform Phnom Penh’s city landscape into a modern, sustainable, commercial and leisure hub with world class facilities purpose-built for both local and overseas businesses and investors. Through the creation of new facilities and spaces, this development will create opportunities for the growth of commerce, culture, arts and sports in Phnom Penh City Center (PPCC). By 2025, the new PPCC district will be home to over 56,000 residents and more than 190,000 daily visitors. In line to expand our business, we are looking for dynamic and qualified candidates to join us to make this company grow further.If the above job requirements ideally match your profile, we would like to invite you to apply with your CV (cover letter is not required) by stating:1. job title: Female Teacher Assistant (Part Time & Full Time)
position: Female Teacher Assistant (Part Time & Full Time)
Job Description:
•	Welcoming students at the gate into the class
•	Look after students inside the classroom, playground, nap room, lunch room and waiting room
•	Take students to clean hands and washroom (TA is expected to help clean the kindergarten students)
•	Be responsible, in conjunction with classroom teachers, to ensure adequate supervision of a safe recreation  and play period for the students during class break times 
•	Speak and behave in professional manners towards all parents, students and staff  of M-TEL International School
•	Assist classroom teacher with the organization of activities (i.e. nursery rhymes, photocopy)
•	Be available for, attend any staff  meetings on Saturday mornings
•	Be ready to translate for parents during Parent-Teacher Conferences (PTC) at the end of each term which generally occur outside of working hours on Saturday
•	Attend all school events that happen during regular school year such as Family Sport Day, Graduation and Recognition Day, Khmer New Year, Christmas, Halloween…
•	Treat each student with care and fairness
•	Talk to students using English language with gentle voice but with firmness
•	Maintain classroom, resources, and materials in the school
•	Maintain hygienic in the classroom, nap room, and lunch room
•	Perform other administrative tasks as required by school
Job Requirement:
Working Hours:

Part Time Morning: 
Monday to Friday 7:00 am to 12:30 pm. 
Saturday: Need to attend whenever there is a staff meeting or school events 

Full Time:
Monday to Friday 7:15 am to 5:15 pm
Saturday: Need to attend whenever there is a staff meeting or school events 


REQUIREMENTS: 

•	Minimum High school Diploma
•	Minimum 1 year working experience with children age 2 to 10 years old at any capacity
•	Confident communicating parents teachers both Khmer and English
•	Enjoys with children 
•	Willingness to learn 
•	Adaptable to changes
•	Punctual, responsible, and a team player
•	Honest, hardworking and takes initiative

Interested applicants are asked to send their updated Curriculum Vitae (CV), current photo and Cover Letter to jobs@mtel-kh.com or drop off in person. (No need to send your certificates). Job Requirement: - ត្រូវចេះបើកតុតុ (PassApp)- ត្រូវមានកំរិតសិក្សារយ៉ាងតិច អាចអាន សសេរបាន- ម៉ោងការងារចាប់ពីម៉ោង 6:00 ព្រឹក - 3:00 រសៀល*អត្តប្រយោជន៍បន្ថែម៖- ប្រាក់បន្ថែមម៉ោង- ថ្លៃកាតទូរស័ព្ទ- ថ្លៃបាយថ្ងៃត្រង់ ០១ពេល- ការធានារ៉ាប់រងគ្រោះថ្នាក់ និងសុខភាព- និងអត្ថប្រយោជន៍ផ្សេងៗទៀត
Company Profile:
PPF Yummy Manufacturing Co., Ltd was founded by three young Cambodian entrepreneurs who have had a lot of experience in Food & Beverage business and are greatly passionate about food and culinary world. 
Witnessing the rapid shift in social trends and lifestyles of Cambodians’ younger generation, they establish this company with a goal to alleviate the burdens of young people who lead hectic lives and provide conveniences to modern-day housewives. PPF Yummy Manufacturing Co., Ltd aims to accomplish this by providing real home-made taste of food that are hygienic, affordable, easy to store, cost-effective, and time-saving. All of the food produced by PPF Yummy Manufacturing Co., Ltd is readily adapted to the modern-day concept of living and can substitute traditional cooking method.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department HR Manager 095968080 hr@ppfyummy.com Phnom Penh #305, St 1005, Phum Bayab, Sangkat Phnom Penh Thmey, Khan Sen Sok Phnom Penh Cambodia 095968080

Job Description: • Manage and control stock in-out• Check quality/quantity and record all kind of goods before receive in• Documentation of equipment, tools and accessories for stock in-out• Open and close stock after finishing work• Track and ensure deliveries are received.• Prepare store space and keep storage by appropriately.• Ensure supplied stocks meet demand prevent overstocking and ordering.• Maintain stock records using manual and/or computerized systems• Prepare reports on adjustments to inventories, spoilt or damaged• Other duties as assign by manager.
Job Requirement: • BBA/Bachelor Degree in related filed• Knowledge of Quick Book and other system is prefer• At least 1 years’ experience in related field • Be able to communicate in English• Knowledge of computer (Ms.Office) • Self-motivation and initiative

Job Description: -	Authorize over the counter services (Account opening, Withdrawal, Deposit, Foreign Exchange, Internal fund transfer, International fund transfer, close account, other request letter of request) -	Introduce bank’s product and services to customers including Deposit and Loan. -	Handle and solve customer calls, inquiry and complaints. -	Approve on ATM Card creation and ATM Cash counting and Loading. - Control cheques, collecting cheque book from branches, clear local cheques report cheque clearing, deposit and inward cheques. - Authorize to update CIF on core banking system. - Check daily report (counter report, Account open, letter of request, marketing report for BM on Tele-marketing) that receive from Teller. - Daily open and close counter & Branch operation on system. - Ensure staff training and compliance with procedures. - Check daily cash count with teller and ensure that cash is balance with report. - Maintain good customer relations and refer customers to appropriate staff for new services to promote business for the bank. - Responsible for vault room and all till’s tellers. - Perform any special order by Management.
Job Requirement: - Degree in Marketing, Finance, Banking, Business Administration or equivalent; - Proven track record in delivering high quality results in short time frames; - Possess superior communication and leadership skills; - At least 5 years work experience in banking industry; - High proficiency spoken and written of English; - Creative, dynamic, flexible, self-direct and self-motivated team player; - Committed, hard-working, and honest individual; - Willing to work under pressure;
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department HR Manager +855964006845 hr@ppcb.com.kh Phnom Penh No 217, Norodom Blvd (St. 41), Sangkat Tonle Basak, Khan Chamkarmorn, Phnom Penh, Kingdom of Cambodia. +855964006845

Job Description: JOB TITLE:    ASSISTANT TO MDREPORTS TO:   MANAGING DIRECTORLOCATION:     PHNOM PENHSALARY RANGE: NEGOTIABLE1.  Filing and retrieving corporate records, documents, reports and     presentation.2.  Helping prepare and attend the meetings between company     representative and business partner3.  Clerical tasks such as phones call, mailing, filing and     photocopying.4.  Arranging logistics for visitors coordinate conference calls     transcribe notes.5.  Manage the MD’s schedule and workload and ensure adequate     preparation for meetings.6.  Facilitate information flow from the MD’s to various departments     of the company.7.  Acting as the point of contact between the executives and     internal or external colleagues.8.  Review and negotiate with customers about the term and condition     of agreement.9.  Deal with tenants on the construction proceed.10. Solve problem with tenants regarding to general service     provision.11. Coordinate with tenant for monthly payment12. Renewal notice letter to tenants before expiry date of the     contract.13. Coordinate between tenant and property management service     provider. 14. Others task as assigned by Managing Director.
Job Requirement: 1.  Bachelor of Business Administration, or other related fields.2.  Good at interpersonal, communication and management skills.3.  At least 2 years experiences in related fields.4.  Able to use Microsoft Word & Excel, Power Point.5.  Be honest, hardworking, fast learning and flexible.6.  Good command in English both writing and speaking.7.  Good command in Chinese both writing and speaking.8.  Excellent time management skills and professional discretion.
Company Profile:
Founded as a family retail store in Phnom Penh in 1986, Y Chhe was incorporated in 2012 and has since expanded into a leading construction and building and materials supplier in Cambodia. Our quality construction and building materials have been used in many real estate and property projects in Cambodia, including hotels. Office and retails buildings, condominium, shopping centers, and boreys.

At Y Chhe, we are a people-orientated company; our business is not only providing the best for our customers but also our employees. We strive to be the benchmark for business standards in Cambodia, and spearhead the introduction of innovation and sustainability in our market.
Contact Info: Contact Information KHIEV Ponleu HR Manager 017 809182, 016 22 58 83 hr@ychhe.com.kh Phnom Penh Floor 15th T.K Central Tower, St 289, Phum 13, Sangkat Boeung Kak1, Khan Toul Kork, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 017 809182, 016 22 58 83

Job Description: JOB TITLE:    PROJECT CONSTRUCTION MANAGERREPORTS TO:   MANAGING DIRECTORLOCATION:     PHNOM PENHSALARY RANGE: NEGOTIABLE1.  Communicate and work closely with contractors and internal teams     in site safety, construction schedules, Work place safety,     environmental and waste management.2.  Coordinate the overall negotiation process, including     negotiation and closing of deals with contractors.3.  Monitor machine and equipment installation and ensure     specifications of the equipment comply with quality standards     and agreement.4.  Monitor delivery status of equipment and ensure installation is     within timeline, budget and project schedule.5.  Work closely with construction team and related departments on     the placement of equipment, supply storage, etc. 6.  Manage the overall performance of the project team and provide     training and development on work and safety Procedures /     guidelines.7.  Assist in the development, review, and update of site safety and     health analysis and ensure that all safety, environmental and     quality policies and practices are understood and complied by     contractors. 8.  Supervise site engineers to ensure efficient and smooth     construction operation, including construction scheduling,     coordination and throughput monitoring.9.  Provide reliability input into maintenance procedures, standards     and specifications.10. Participate in technical investigations, studies, problem     review, new and proposed equipment, materials, processes and     facilities and provide sound engineering evaluations and     recommendations for proposed actions.11. Perform other related duties as assigned.
Job Requirement: 1.  Bachelor’s degree in Engineering, MEP engineering or a related     field. Master’s degree is preferred.2.  Minimum 5 years of experience in construction project.3.  In-depth knowledge and understanding of construction materials,     structural projects, etc. 4.  Knowledge of construction methods and strategies.5.  Knowledge of project management and risk management.6.  Excellent communication and interpersonal skills with the     ability to communicate professionally with contractors,     customers, managers and employees at all level.7.  Ability to identify risks and mitigate forthcoming conflicts or     unacceptable business outcomes.8.  Ability to think creatively, innovatively and strategically.9.  Strong analytical, planning and organizing skills.

Job Description: - Perform daily Marketing. - Increase sale volume of loan product to achieve target. - Check daily loan proposals. - Site visit new borrowers. - Check loans in arrear and repayment. - Supervise activities of loan officers. - Submit loan documentation for Credit Committee meeting. - Semi-authorize for all medium and big loan sizes. - Check monthly Loan report. - Check overdraft statement submitted by responsible loan officer. - Monitor loan arrear on a monthly basis. - Monitor, follow up all selling process and deal with the customer. - Keep up-to-date of the bank’s latest products. - Maintain relationship with existing and new customers, refer new customers to new services to promote business for the bank.
Job Requirement: - Degree in Marketing, Finance, Banking, Business Administration or equivalent; - Proven track record in delivering high quality results in short time frames; - Possess superior communication and leadership skills; - At least 5 years work experience in banking industry; - High proficiency spoken and written of English; - Creative, dynamic, flexible, self-direct and self-motivated team player; - Committed, hard-working, and honest individual; -  Willing to work under pressure
